title: LF duo partner  to get to gold
body: Currently sitting at silver 5 . Best role is adc but can go anywhere if needed. Looking to climb before the season ends. I am not toxic or abusive to others

replies.body:
Aus Dave -

Add me, feel i can play all roles comfortably and am serious about climbing :)
Be careful though because when you team up the game increases the skill of the opponents you are matched with to compensate so it can actually turn out a lot harder to climb.
